channel.title: New Owner crown is too big, covers chat
channel.description: As you can see its too big, i cant make it smaller without cutting the crown off. Is there any way i can fix this keeping this crown or no?[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tnBAwgE.png[/img]

item.title: New Owner crown is too big, covers chat
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“frozenearth, post:12, topic:530326”]every time i do it with paint it looks ugly :S

Please anyone?[/quote]
The reason it “looks ugly” in paint, is because the image is so small that any shift in size ‘dramatically’ changes what pixels are shown.
In just about any image edit software it’s going to come out the same, photoshop and gimp may make it look a bit better on resize, but not too much. I’d just look for different crowns.

Read full topic

item.title: New Owner crown is too big, covers chat
item.dc:creator: @frozenearth frozenearth
item.description:
@frozenearth wrote:

ArmorCroc:

'Aight. Wouldn’t it be easier to just .zip 'em and upload only one file? And the thing I did when I wanted those crowns with slight twists here and there, it’s only 143 pixels total, it’s very easy to make your own ones AND it might help you in the future when you want to do sprites of the lower size. Not knowing what MS Paint is capable of is a frightening thought.

i know ok, can you just zip them? Then upload to this thread?
How to upload?

Click additional Options, then attach.

Read full topic

item.title: New Owner crown is too big, covers chat
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Go into your cache, where ever you placed the crown. Right click and hit edit.
Shrink it to 13x11.
Done.

(I know this because that crown package is full of sprites that are 14x15 and related)

Read full topic

item.title: New Owner crown is too big, covers chat
item.dc:creator: @ArmorCroc ArmorCroc
item.description:
@ArmorCroc wrote:

Uhmm… Where did you get this crown image? I know quite well why it won’t fit. The picture is either itself too big, or it’s being extended/expanded/enlargened by some part of the class. If the old crown worked as supposed, this new one is the rotten apple. Shrink it in that case.

Read full topic
